name: Demolition Derby Car Driving
description:
Demolition Derby - Extreme Car Stunt Wars brings you a deadly derby car battle where smashing cars & firing missiles will knock out your derby opponents. It’s time to win extreme derby stunts war in derby demolition car battle and experience furious driving and crash racing. Experience extreme derby car stunts in fast death racing game where you will crash derby rivals. Experience the real thrill of fast driving, drift racing and demolition derby war destruction in real Demolition Derby - Extreme Car Stunt Wars. The weaponized derby car has the power to fire missile to distant opponents so you can quickly win the wars racing tournament. As a real demolition derby racer, hit hard and open rapid fire to damage your opponents’ vehicles.

It’s time for reckless drive and fire rapid missile to wipeout the rivals in epic car battle show. Make your engine roar, show massive jumps, dodge the opponents, cross the hurdles in incredible car racing battle. Speed up your derby and show daredevil driving skills in derby demolition racing adventure. Bash to crash derby with extreme stunts in thrilling gameplay. Drive at furious speed as a reckless driver and use rapid gun fire to crash derby rivals into pieces. Drive the weaponized derby in extreme racing stunt drive and let no other win the thrilling car stunt show.

Demolition Derby - Extreme Car Stunt Wars is full of action and adventure where breathtaking car stunts and extreme car driving inside war arena will make you the real superhero derby car driver. Will you be able to survive in deadly demolition mania? Become the last survivor in Demolition Derby - Extreme Car Stunts Wars where extreme shooting, hits, smash, crash and reckless drive will make you the real stunts man driver in deadly car battle. Exhibit best racing and driving skills and wreck into other cars. Survive in the deadly battle arena as long as you can and see the real-time car destruction in death racing extreme stunt wars.

Features:
+ Crash & smash the cars inside arena!
+ Battle against multiple opponents!
+ Survive the deadly demolition derby war!
+ Destruction, fire, hurdles, jumps, crash & car stunts!
+ Extreme car stunts driving and crash racing!
+ Realistic car physics and smooth controls!
+ Amazing 3D graphics and best sound effects!
